job.title: Senior Software Engineer
job.description: pWe are looking for a hardworking innovative and goal driven Senior Software Engineer to join our Enterprise Information Management team for a new HTML amp Angular project The ideal candidate will have excellent frontend and Angular development skills including developing new user interfaces from scratch Candidates should possess complementary skills on the backend API and database layersppbrppRemote candidates are acceptable with a preference for local candidates in the Las Vegas or Henderson NV areappbrppbrppResponsibilitiespp	Develop quality Enterprise Information Management software utilizing Microsoft software development languages and toolspp	Create software designs for enhancements or features based on best practicespp	Participates in code and design reviews Makes updates based on review recommendationspp	Keeps current on latest Microsoft development productspp	Provide support and maintenance on existing applications with the assistance of more experienced engineers as neededpp	Documents and demonstrates solutions by developing documentation flowcharts layouts diagrams charts code comments and clear code with the assistance of more experienced engineers as neededpp	Demonstrate code quality through proper unit and other testingpp	Break down user stories into component tasks and provide estimates with the assistance of more experienced engineers as neededpp	Work in a collaborative development environment with a team of developersppbrppbrppThe above statements are intended only to describe the general nature of the job and should not be construed as an allinclusive list of position responsibilitiesppbrppRequirementspp	Previous Software Engineering experience 6 yearspp	Front End Development pp o HTML5 5 yearspp o CSS3 5 yearspp o Angular 6 4 yearspp	Back End Development pp o NetNet CoreCEFMSSQL experience 5 yearspp o C 5 yearspp o ASPNET 5 yearspp o SQL Server 20081216 6 yearspp	Visual Studio 2015  Visual Studio Code 5 yearspp	Object Oriented Programming OOP and software patternspp	Basic understanding of agile software development principles and techniques Understand iterative software developmentpp	Basic understanding of the software development lifecycle and multiple software development approachespp	Desire to be part of a highly productive fastpaced teampp	Fouryear college degree or equivalent pp	Organized and detailorientedpp	Working knowledge of Git version control systempp	Experience working on a Scrum teamppbrppbrppPreferredpp	Knowledge of thirdparty JavaScript libraries RxJS Ngrx Angular Material etcpp	Knowledge of credit union andor banking industryppbrppThe above statements are intended only to describe the general nature of the job and should not be construed as an allinclusive list of position responsibilitiesppbrppEmployee Polygraph Protection ActppEqual Employment Opportunity ppFamily and Medical Leave ActppbrppAlogent is an Equal OpportunityAffirmative Action employer All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex national origin disability or protected Veteran statusp
